英文公告.機關名稱: TAIWAN RAILWAY ADMINISTRATION, MINISTRY OF TRANSPORTATION AND COMMUNICATIONS
英文公告.標案名稱: Taiwan Railways Administration, MOTC is offering a tender with following service inclusive: cleaning and washing for rail cars, operation for insert-type train indication plates, replacing train seat covers, catering service, and relevant places cleaning.
英文公告.廠商名稱: HUI CHAN CHEN GEE CO., LTD.
英文公告.廠商地址: 1F.,NO.252-2, LONGJIANG RD., JHONGSHAN DISTRICT , Taipei City 104, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Contract Period:The validity of contract will last for 3 years, starting from Jan. 1, 2012 to Dec. 31, 2014.Suppliers’ Qualifications:The suppliers with following all requirements will be entitled to submit the tender.(A):Suppliers’ basic Qualifications:1. J101010 for building cleaning service industry or JA01990 for other automobile service industry or J101990 for other environment sanitation and pollution control service industry.2.With Disease & Bacteria Prevention & Control Industry Permit issued by government or proof of collaborating with other legal disease & bacteria prevention & control industry suppliers.3. Proof of Tax payment(B):The suppliers of contracting members of the Agreement of Government Procurement(GPA) in the WTO are permitted to submit their tender and required to submit the following qualification documents in putting forward the tender :1.The registered official document of subsidiary, branch organization or office granted by our Government must be enclosed. 2.The basic qualification of the afore-designated foreign suppliers is the same as our suppliers’.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.15.18機關名稱：交通部臺灣鐵路管理局
決標資料.附加說明: 本案為單價決標，決標單價為「每1換算輛洗車費單價新台幣380元整」
